headline: This top VC has bet close to 20% of his fund on teenagers — here’s why
summary: Eventbrite co-founder Kevin Hartz is onto his next thing — teenage founders, not as a social experiment but as an unplanned investment thesis.

headline: Coca-Cola (KO) Adds Fintech Leader to Board: What Does This Mean for Its Valuation?
summary: Coca-Cola (NYSE:KO) just welcomed Max Levchin, co-founder of PayPal and CEO of Affirm, to its board of directors. This signals a fresh step for the company as it looks to strengthen its digital innovation strategy and improve adaptability to shifting consumer and industry trends. See our latest analysis for Coca-Cola. Coca-Cola’s steady stream of executive changes, including the recent addition of Max Levchin and multiple new regional leaders, has coincided with renewed interest in the stock...

headline: PayPal's Growth And Buybacks Are Expected To Double Shareholders Returns
summary: PayPal appears deeply undervalued with strong cash flow, brand power, and buybacks driving long-term value despite risks. Read why PYPL stock is a strong buy.

headline: How a $300 Trillion Stablecoin Minting Error at PayPal Holdings (PYPL) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Earlier this week, PayPal's blockchain partner Paxos mistakenly minted a very large amount of unbacked PYUSD stablecoin, $300 trillion instead of the intended $300 million, before swiftly correcting the error by burning the excess tokens. This incident intensified regulatory scrutiny and raised significant questions about oversight and safeguards in stablecoin protocols, bringing PayPal's role in the digital asset ecosystem under greater examination. We'll examine how this stablecoin minting...
